featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Hello Lraschell Morton,

I'm deeply sorry that you had such an unpleasant experience at our store. We ask all customers if they would like for us to open the toy and make sure it is in working condition. Due to state law once you leave our store with the toy, we cannot for any reason take it back; So, by assessing the toy we save you time and money if it does not work/damaged. You can opt out of us evaluating the toys condition and the explanation on how the toy works, we want to make sure that you are leaving with a toy with which you are genuinely happy with. We would love to make this right, if possible, please feel free to reach out to us via visiting one of are locations, calling or sending an email.
Have a wonderful day
Uptown Adult Superstore
featured_reviews.review_translated_text: Buranin yasadisi olarak acik olup olmadigini bilmiyorum ama kasiyerin musterilere esyalari acmasindan nefret ediyorum. Tipki sokak satislarinda esyalarini satmalari kadar kisiliksiz. Ikinci kez aksam gorevlisi benim icin bir esya acti ve guc sistemine yon verdi. Yavas oldugumu ima ediyormus gibi hissediyorum. Yetiskin masaj oyuncaklari sizi yavaslatir mi? Ben de ona karsi ayni "arkadas canlisi" olmaya calisiyorum ama o, sormadan, saygili bir sekilde sinirlari asmayi ustleniyor. Duzenleme @2:58 2 Mart 2020, oysa bir haftadan biraz daha uzun bir sure once 45 dolara bir urun satin aldim, bacaklarim buyudu ve uzaklasti. Bulunsun diye koydugum bir yer degil. featured_reviews.response_from_owner_translated_text:
Merhaba Lraschell Morton,

Magazamizda boyle hos olmayan bir deneyim yasadiginiz icin cok uzgunum. Tum musterilerimize oyuncagi acmamizi ve calisir durumda oldugundan emin olmamizi isteyip istemediklerini soruyoruz. Eyalet yasalarina gore, oyuncakla birlikte magazamizdan ciktiginizda onu hicbir nedenle geri alamayiz; Yani oyuncagi degerlendirerek, calismamasi/hasar gormesi durumunda zamandan ve paradan tasarruf etmenizi sagliyoruz. Oyuncaklarin durumunu ve oyuncagin nasil calistigina dair aciklamayi degerlendirerek bizden vazgecebilirsiniz; gercekten memnun kalacaginiz bir oyuncakla ayrildiginizdan emin olmak istiyoruz. Bunu duzeltmek isteriz, eger mumkunse, lutfen konumlardan birini ziyaret ederek, arayarak veya e-posta gondererek bize ulasmaktan cekinmeyin.
Iyi gunler
Uptown Yetiskin Magazasi

It's hard to take someone seriously on cleanliness when your only other review was at Walmart complaining about ant traps and ice cream? Something tells me your a slob. As far as the booth area you were the only one I had to throw out for exposing his tiny weiner and complaining about the lack of "tyranny movies". All that aside you strike me as someone who would hide behind a keyboard talking like you are. I'm Ray and I'm here everyday if you ever have any problems. Thank you and good luck with the ants.

Iceri girdiginizde kotu kokuyor. Eski, tozlu urunler sonsuza kadar ortalikta duruyor. Ah, bir de arka kabinlerde tam bir nekkid adamlar var  ve kimsenin umrunda degilmis gibi gorunuyor hahaha

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_translated_text: Buck, incelemeni takdir ettigim kadar. Diger tek incelemeniz Walmart'ta karinca tuzaklari ve dondurma hakkinda sikayet ederken, birini temizlik konusunda ciddiye almak zor mu? Icimden bir ses senin pasakli oldugunu soyluyor. Stand alanina gelince, minik sosisini ifsa ettigin ve "zorba filmlerin" eksikliginden sikayet ettigin icin disari atmak zorunda kaldigim tek kisi sendin. Butun bunlar bir yana, klavyenin arkasina saklanip kendin gibi konusan biri gibi gorunuyorsun bana. Ben Ray ve herhangi bir sorun yasarsaniz her gun buradayim. Tesekkur ederim ve karincalara iyi sanslar dilerim.

It was nice when the motel next door was up and running they used to have some very decent looking women in there you could always catch by the bookstore, and the dance club on the other side. Kitapci artik eski, pis kokulu bir kitapciya donustu ve icinde degerli hicbir sey yok. Burayi acik tutan tek sey motel ve dans kulubuydu. Kohne, oyuncaklari yok, kirli, kapatin en azindan mahallemizde baska bir motel almayi deneyebiliriz!

featured_reviews.review_id:
25 minutes ago
I was amazed at the rudeness of the staff at this location! (Specifically- with a staff member named Tabitha).
A friend of mine had been in the store a few minutes earlier, and disagreed with the mask-wearing policy. He had left without a scene. When I came in, she suggested that I should not be given service...due to my friend "yelling" (which he didn't!) I was polite, but asked for her name, and said I would be discussing her rudeness with management. She responded: "well...you will just end up calling this store & talking to me then!!"
I have been going to Intimate Ideas for many years (not this location) for many years & have NEVER been treated so badly before.
If I could give less than '1 star' for a review...I would!!

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Shay, we're really sorry to hear about your recent experience with us. We take your feedback seriously and want to make sure every visit is comfortable. At our taylor location we do not have a male currently working, but we'd like to investigate further. Could you please let us know approximately when this happened? We appreciate your feedback and hope you'll give us another chance to make it right.

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_translated_text: Merhaba Shay, bizimle olan son deneyiminizi duydugumuza gercekten uzulduk. Geri bildiriminizi ciddiye aliyoruz ve her ziyaretin konforlu oldugundan emin olmak istiyoruz. Taylor lokasyonumuzda su anda calisan bir erkek yok, ancak daha fazla arastirma yapmak istiyoruz. Bu olayin yaklasik olarak ne zaman gerceklestigini bize bildirir misiniz? Geri bildiriminizi takdir ediyoruz ve bunu duzeltmemiz icin bize bir sans daha vereceginizi umuyoruz.

featured_reviews.review_id: Great store...when I can get in there. The posted hours are not followed consistently. Staff close the store periodically without any notification to the customers waiting outside and do not answer the phone. I've watched this store lose business multiple times while staff had the door locked during business hours and the open sign lit. It's not worth making the trip to this store unless you live in the neighborhood, otherwise you might be wasting your precious gas.

Personel, disarida bekleyen musterilere herhangi bir bildirimde bulunmadan magazayi belirli araliklarla kapatiyor ve telefonlara cevap vermiyor. Personelin calisma saatleri sirasinda kapiyi kilitlemesi ve acik tabelasinin yanmasi sirasinda bu magazanin bircok kez isini kaybettigini gordum. featured_reviews.review_id: We walked in and immediately a nice young fresh faced women named Mia greeted us  and told us about the deals for today. We are outdated when it comes to this, married for 20 years and haven't walked into a store like this since we were newly weds so we had a million questions. Mia was professional, kind and patient. From the moment she introduced herself all the way through she made us both feel as if we were in our own home discussing very intimate topics with each other. Now as a bar manger in downtown detroit of nearly 15 years myself, this experience was appreciated, i know what's expected. However it takes a lot to impress me and Mia did exactly that with ease. Not only did she explain every detail of each product we  were purchasing she went above and beyond helping us "out of date" folks feel comfortable with actual real excitement and enthusiasm in the products she was selling us!!! We would have never bought as much as we did if it wasn't for her confidence and knowledge in the products. We will definitely be back just because of Mia .

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: We are super pleased to hear Mia was able to provide you with such a memorable experience. We will be sure to pass them on to her as well!
featured_reviews.review_translated_text: Iceri girdik ve hemen Mia adinda hos, genc ve taze yuzlu bir kadin bizi karsiladi ve bize bugunun firsatlarini anlatti. Bu konuda modasi gecmis durumdayiz, 20 yildir evliyiz ve yeni evlendigimizden beri boyle bir magazaya girmedik, bu yuzden milyonlarca sorumuz vardi. Mia profesyonel, nazik ve sabirliydi. Kendini tanittigi andan itibaren ikimize de sanki kendi evimizdeymisiz gibi cok samimi konulari birbirimizle tartisiyormusuz gibi hissettirdi. Simdi yaklasik 15 yildir Detroit sehir merkezinde bir bar muduru olarak bu deneyim takdir edildi, ne beklendigini biliyorum. Ancak beni etkilemek icin cok sey gerekiyor ve Mia da tam olarak bunu kolaylikla basardi. Satin aldigimiz her urunun her ayrintisini aciklamakla kalmadi, yukarida ve oteye giderek bize sattigi urunlerde "guncelligi gecmis" insanlarin gercek heyecan ve coskuyla kendilerini rahat hissetmelerine yardimci oldu!!! Onun urunlere olan guveni ve bilgisi olmasaydi asla bu kadar cok alisveris yapmazdik. Kesinlikle Mia yuzunden geri donecegiz.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_translated_text: Mia'nin size boyle unutulmaz bir deneyim sunabildigini duymaktan cok memnunuz. Onlari da ona iletecegimizden emin olacagiz!

featured_question.question:
(Google tarafindan cevrilmistir) Bir siparis verirsem nakliye kutulariniz ayridir... Komsularimin verandamda ne oldugunu gormesini istemiyorum gizlilik sebebini biliyorsunuz

(Orijinal)
If I place a order shipping are your boxes discrete....I don't want my neighbors  to see what i have on my porch privacy reason you know
featured_question.answer:
(Google tarafindan cevrilmistir) Evet, cevrimici siparisler, urunlerin eklendigi veya nereden geldigi belirtilmeden duz, markasiz ambalajlarda gonderilir.

(Orijinal)
Yes, online orders are shipped in plain non-branded packaging with no indication of either the products enclosed or where it comes from.

featured_reviews.review_id:
I've been here about 2 or 3 times. All the items I've gotten here were great and I've always received great customer service! Until tonight.

My friend (male) and I went into the store to look for some things. We looked around, cracked some jokes about the gag gifts they had (we're in our 20s, it's bound to happen), and looked at some toys. Another customer was in there with us, she was nice and even said hi to us. She eventually left. Keep this in mind.

Suddenly, one of the workers (a white woman with blonde hair) YELLS at us. Says we're being "rambunctious" and basically implying that we're scaring customers away. We apologize multiple times and she continues to complain while we do it. We were very respectful in our apologies, but she just kept going.

Not only that, she tried to whisper on the phone to someone about us. My best friend and I loved this place, but now we will not be returning. Very disrespectful. They lost 2 customers. Although, there was another worker in there that was very respectful and helpful! I left a voice mail to corporate and am hoping to hear from them soon and that the women gets disciplinary action. This is not how customer service is supposed to be.

UPDATE: I was able to get in touch with the district manager, they were very helpful and resolved the situation! I really appreciated that they listened to me and took action.

featured_reviews.review_translated_text:
Burada yaklasik 2 veya 3 kez bulundum. Burada aldigim tum urunler harikaydi ve her zaman harika bir musteri hizmeti aldim! Bu geceye kadar.

Arkadasim (erkek) ve ben bazi seyler aramak icin dukkana gittik. Etrafa baktik, sahip olduklari saka hediyeleri hakkinda bazi sakalar yaptik (20'li yaslarimizdayiz, bu mutlaka olacak) ve bazi oyuncaklara baktik. Baska bir musteri bizimle oradaydi, iyi biriydi ve hatta bize merhaba dedi. Sonunda ayrildi. Bunu aklinda tut.

Aniden, iscilerden biri (sari sacli beyaz bir kadin) bize BAGIRDI. "Sacma sapan" davrandigimizi soyluyor ve temelde musterileri korkuttugumuzu ima ediyor. Defalarca ozur dileriz ve bunu yaparken de sikayet etmeye devam eder. Ozurlerimizde cok saygiliydik ama o devam etti.

Sadece bu da degil, telefonda birilerine bizim hakkimizda fisildamaya calisti. En iyi arkadasim ve ben burayi cok sevdik ama simdi geri donmeyecegiz. Cok saygisiz. 2 musteri kaybettiler. Yine de, orada cok saygili ve yardimsever baska bir isci vardi! Sirkete bir sesli mesaj biraktim ve onlardan yakinda haber almayi ve kadinlarin disiplin cezasi almasini umuyorum. Musteri hizmetlerinin boyle olmasi gerekmiyor.

GUNCELLEME: Bolge muduruyle iletisime gecebildim, cok yardimci oldular ve durumu cozduler! Beni dinleyip harekete gecmelerini gercekten takdir ettim.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_translated_text: Incelemeniz icin tesekkur ederiz. Bu kadar kotu bir deneyim yasadiginizi duyduguma uzuldum, ancak bunu dikkatimize sundugunuz icin gercekten minnettarim. Calisanimiz, bildigimiz konuksever ve yardimsever ortami saglamadiysa ozur dilerim. Lutfen durumu inceleyebilmemiz icin iletisim bilgilerinizle birlikte info@cirillas.com adresinden bize e-posta gonderin.

When trying on an outfit in the dressing room, the short wide white lady with brown short hair & bandanna (Ronnie or Sky) stood outside the dressing room door the ENTIRE time, not helping anyone else in the store. I had my friend come inside the dressing room to help tie up my corset. Ronnie/Sky immediately told her she couldn't be in the room with me & the door had to be open. It was super uncomfortable to have the dressing room door open getting a corset tied up while men were shopping around. Dressing rooms are to be private, there is no policy stating doors had to be open when receiving assistance with wardrobe. She said the door had to be open or she had to get out.
